name: Permanent Marker
description:
Welcome to Permanent Marker! The only tattoo parlor in town that hires PURELY amateurs, making every design... truly... unique... heh.

Grab a stack of templates and start inking some skin. Choose between 3 different needle widths, earn bigger tips through great service, and show the world that you're not just the first applicant willing to accept minimum wage! 

Made for the 2022 #PPJJGG hosted by Pursuing Pixels! https://itch.io/jam/pursuing-pixels-james-jam-game-gam 

Controls: Move the mouse to aim your tattoo machine! Left click to draw! (Careful not to move too fast, or you could hurt someone!) Use the scroll wheel to choose your needle tip!

CREDITS: 

Code: Hun

Music: Hun

Art: Bun

Special thanks to my (Hun's) siblings for both help with the concept, and the research regarding tattoos!
